sentences.en: ...two men suspected of being police informers.
sentences.cn: …被怀疑为警方线人的两名男子。

sentences.en: Alex Vandervoort had authorized him to employ an informer.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯·范德沃特同意他雇用一名暗探.

sentences.en: An informer denounced him to the police.
sentences.cn: 检举人已向警方告发他.

sentences.en: Any one of our employees could be the informer.
sentences.cn: 我们的任何一位雇员都有可能成为告密者.

sentences.en: He have a whole stable of informer work for him.
sentences.cn: 他有一群告密者为他效劳.

sentences.en: I would never act as informer against you.
sentences.cn: 我永远也不会做对你不利的告密者.

sentences.en: Is he merely an informer, giving information to the child?
sentences.cn: 他只是个教导者, 给孩子知识 吗 ?

sentences.en: One of the gang members had turned informer.
sentences.cn: 团夥中的一员后来变成了告密者.

sentences.en: Others who were named by the informer at first confessed themselves Christians, and then denied it.
sentences.cn: 另外有些被告发的人起先供认自己是基督徒, 后来又否认.

sentences.en: Prentice saw Goss fall in behind the informer.
sentences.cn: 普伦蒂斯看见戈斯走在密探身后。

sentences.en: Speak out of turn, and an informer reports you.
sentences.cn: 你稍微不慎说了一点不适宜的话, 会有人打小报告.

sentences.en: The gang leader decided that the informer must be taken for a ride.
sentences.cn: 歹徒头目决定要将告密者用汽车绑架去干掉.

sentences.en: The informer betrayed them to the police.
sentences.cn: 告密者把他们出卖给了警察.

sentences.en: The informer has done dirt to her.
sentences.cn: 告密者说了她很多坏话.

sentences.en: The informer provided very important clues for us.
sentences.cn: 线人给我们提供了非常有价值的线报.

sentences.en: The informer said that one of the gang would have a revolver.
sentences.cn: 通报者透露匪徒中有一人手中有枪.
